notes: This appears to be an introduction/overview page of the Shopee Open Platform documentation rather than a specific API endpoint documentation. It contains general information about the platform, its benefits, and who can access it. The left sidebar shows a full documentation structure including sections for API calls, authentication, and various integration guides.
